title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 171.3 - Available Assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 171.3 - Available Assistance

State Regulations
(a) The

Fund makes available financial assistance in the form of grants for job
creation and training programs approved by the commissioner of economic
development that support efforts to recruit, hire, promote, retain, develop and
train a diverse and inclusive workforce as production company employees in the
motion picture and television Production and Post-Production industries within
the state of New York including, but not limited to, those programs that
promote development in economically distressed areas of the state. (b) The grant assistance provided in
connection with this Part shall be taken from the empire state entertainment
diversity job training development fund pursuant to section
24 (e)
and
31 (f)
of the tax
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
171.3

Adopted

New

York State Register July 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 26, eff. 7/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
